json_to_edit.voice_over: The melody followed me, even in my dreams.
json_to_edit.description: Aria is tormented by a mysterious melody that haunts her every night.
json_to_edit.name: Nocturnal Serenade
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Aria experiences a recurring dream where a mysterious melody haunts her.

qa.action: Aria's bedroom bathed in moonlight, creating an otherworldly atmosphere.

hf.action: Aria tosses and turns in her bed, clearly disturbed by something in her dreams.

tr.action: Aria's face contorts in distress as the melody grows stronger in her mind.

xc.action: The room seems to shimmer and distort as the melody takes form.

ka.action: Aria sits up in bed, her eyes wide open but unseeing.

fn.action: Aria's lips move slightly, as if trying to sing along with the haunting tune.

af.action: The room appears to spin slowly as the melody reaches its crescendo.

qo.action: Aria clutches her chest, overwhelmed by the intensity of the music.

fp.action: A single tear rolls down Aria's cheek as the melody suddenly stops.

edit_command: Add a new shot after every three existing shots, but don't change anything else in the scene.

label.rationale: we will add three new shots to the scene, inserting them after every three existing shots. this will increase the total number of shots from 9 to 12. we'll create new shots that complement the existing narrative and maintain the haunting, dreamlike atmosphere of the scene. we'll update the "number_of_shots" field and add the new shots to the "shots" dictionary, adjusting the "list_display_order" accordingly. the rest of the scene details will remain unchanged.
